snippet.title: Snapimals: Explore. Snap.Build.
snippet.description:
“This one, is different. Very rare I come across something like this, from innovation and from product perspective” - Sidar, CEO Peak Games

“This one is achingly cute and honestly fun” – Apple Editorial Board

“Snapimals oozes with charm. It’s a simply feel good game, built with a lot of heart, and has already stolen ours”  - Gamezebo

﻿Gamezebo: "Snapimals is the Pokémon Game the Rest of Us Have Been Waiting For"

Snapimals is a ridiculously charming simulation that combines wildlife photography with lite park building elements. Besides the laid-back and rewarding gameplay, everything about Snapimals oozes with charm. The animals are lively and adorable, making each trip out with your camera a delight. It’s a simply feel good game, obviously built with a lot of heart, and has already stolen ours  --  Jillian Werner
